sourcesContent:
<style></style>

<template>
    <button @click="get_message()">
        获取
    </button>
</template>
<script>
import Cookies from 'js-cookie';
export default {
    mounted() {
        Cookies.set('skey', 'sCZRnCRB', { expires: 7 });
        Cookies.set('vid', '442726869', { expires: 7 });
    },
    methods: {
        get_message() {
            let url = "http://127.0.0.1:5000/weread/info"
            fetch(url, {
                method: 'POST' ,
                credentials: 'include' // 或者 POST 等其他请求方法，按需调整
            }).then(response => response.json())
.then(jsonData => console.log("111", jsonData))
.then(data => console.log("22" + data))
.catch(error => console.error("333" + error));
            
        }
    }
};
</script>
